channel.title: Js Plugin on This Site
channel.description: Recent content in Js Plugin on This Site

item.title: Adding Scrollable Sticy Sidebar in Your Website
item.description: file dependency https://abouolia.github.io/sticky-sidebar/examples/scrollable-element.html link will help you to understand how sticky scrollbar works. Just view page source and implement in your website. project gihub page link https://abouolia.github.io/sticky-sidebar/ https://abouolia.github.io/sticky-sidebar/js/rAF.js https://abouolia.github.io/sticky-sidebar/js/ResizeSensor.js https://abouolia.github.io/sticky-sidebar/js/sticky-sidebar.js html part <section class="mainsingle"> <div class='mainsingle__content'> <div class='row'> <div class='col-md-7'> <div class='mainsingle__content__image'> <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Vel cumque, ut expedita, fugiat cupiditate blanditiis magni odit. Consectetur illum eaque necessitatibus, voluptate molestiae at quae accusamus veritatis quibusdam laborum cum quidem.

item.title: How to Show Magnipop Modal in Full Screen Along With Scoped Class
item.description: file dependency magnific-popup.css magnific-popup.js jquery magnific-popup can be downloaded from http://dimsemenov.com/plugins/magnific-popup/ page Html part <div class='mainsingle__content__image'> <ul> <li> <a class='single-image-group' href='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_1_1_1.jpg'> <img src='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_1_1_1.jpg' alt=''/> </a> <a class='single-image-group' href='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_2_1_1.jpg'> <img src='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_2_1_1.jpg' alt=''/> </a> <a class='single-image-group' href='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_2_2_1.jpg'> <img src='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_2_2_1.jpg' alt=''/> </a> <a class='single-image-group' href='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_2_3_1.jpg'> <img src='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_2_3_1.jpg' alt=''/> </a> <a class='single-image-group' href='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_2_4_1.jpg'> <img src='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_2_4_1.jpg' alt=''/> </a> <a class='single-image-group' href='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_2_5_1.jpg'> <img src='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_2_5_1.jpg' alt=''/> </a> <a class='single-image-group' href='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_2_6_1.jpg'> <img src='assets/images/product_image/0518254500_2_6_1.jpg' alt=''/> </a> </li> </ul> </div> css part all css scoped under .

item.title: How to Make Full Width Image and Video Carousal Using Owl Carousal
item.description: file dependency https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/OwlCarousel2/2.3.4/assets/owl.carousel.min.css https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.3.1/jquery.min.js https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/OwlCarousel2/2.3.4/owl.carousel.min.js html part in html markup .oc__item__content__media accept 4 data attribute data-type=‘image’ data-menu_color=“black” data-background_position=“center 0” data-source=‘assets/images/product_image/slider/desktop_background.jpg’ Here data-type will be image or video data-menu_color will be white or nothing. I mean if you don’t want to change basic black color, you can ignore. data-background_position will be valid css background position - default center center. You can ignore if you want to make position center center data-source will be image or video source.
